text: Carlos Eduardo Moreira Ferreira (9 March 1939 – 1 May 2022) was a Brazilian businessman and politician. He was a member of the Liberal Front Party. He was president of the from 2002 to 2006. He was born in São Paulo, Brazil. From 1999 until 2003, he was a member of the Chamber of Deputies of Brazil. Moreira Ferreira died in São Paulo on 1 May 2022 at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from São Paulo Category:Businesspeople from São Paulo Category:Democrats (Brazil) politicians
title: Carlos Eduardo Moreira Ferreira
